source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

properties.description: Load SQL DB Adventure Work to Synapse

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripDataCSV
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		surcharge as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		total_amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TripFareSQL
TripDataCSV, TripFareSQL join(TripDataCSV@medallion == TripFareSQL@medallion
	&& TripDataCSV@hack_license == TripFareSQL@hack_license
	&& TripDataCSV@vendor_id == TripFareSQL@vendor_id
	&& TripDataCSV@pickup_datetime == TripFareSQL@pickup_datetime,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinWithTripFare
InnerJoinWithTripFare aggregate(groupBy(payment_type),
	Average_Fare = avg(toInteger(total_amount)),
		total_trip_distance = sum(toInteger(trip_distance))) ~> AggByPaymentType
AggByPaymentType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLDWSink

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MovieData
MovieData filter(toInteger(year) >= 1990 && toInteger(year) <=2000) ~> FilterYear1990to2000
FilterYear1990to2000 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AvgRating = avg(toInteger(Rating)),
		AvgRottenRating = avg(toInteger({Rotton Tomato}))) ~> AggMovieRatig
AggMovieRatig sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AvgRatingByYear.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AvgMovieRatingsbyYear
